Welcome To Dr HomeFixer

Now you will be taught how to make care of and clean your device for free, the are several steps,but overall it is not simple.Our goal is to spread knowledge to everyone, simplify stages and make them accessible to all.

The steps

Step 1 :Get tools ready.

Step 2 :Power off the device and disconnect it from the electricity.

Step 3 :We unscrew the screws with their special screw.

Step 4 :Gently remove the laptop cover from the back.

Step 5 :Separate the heatsink from the motherboard.

Step 6 :Clean the Fans & all the surfaces

Step 7 :Remove the thermal paste

Step 8 :Apply Thermal paste

Step 9 : Reassemble your laptop
